00022 function smarty_function_saurl($params, &$smarty) {
00023         $pageName = $params['page'];
00024         $port = ($params['port']) ? $params['port'] : 80;
00025         $secure = ($params['secure']) ? $params['secure'] : false;
00026         
00027         $events = $params['events'];
00028         if ($events) {  
00029                 $app = $smarty->get_template_vars('app');
00030                 $params[$app->getGPEventsName()] = $events;
00031         }
00032         
00033         unset($params['port']);
00034         unset($params['secure']);       
00035         unset($params['page']);
00036         unset($params['events']);
00037         return SAUrl::url($pageName, $params, $port, $secure);
00038 }
